thread.title: United Arab Emirates Welcomes Security Council Resolution Calling for Ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan
thread.title_full: APO Group - Africa Newsroom / Press release | United Arab Emirates Welcomes Security Council Resolution Calling for Ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan

author: United Arab Emirates Ministry of Foreign Affairs & International Cooperation
title: United Arab Emirates Welcomes Security Council Resolution Calling for Ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan
text: [United Arab Emirates Ministry of Foreign Affairs & International Cooperation](https://africa-newsroom.com/press/source/united-arab-emirates-ministry-of-foreign-affairs-and-international-cooperation)| United Arab Emirates Welcomes Security Council Resolution Calling for Ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan The Ministry underscored its steadfast support for all endeavors working towards de-escalation, achieving a ceasefire, and initiating Political dialogue The UAE has welcomed the UN Security Council resolution which calls for a ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan, in light of the continued deterioration of the humanitarian situation. In a statement, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs expressed hope that this step would lead towards ending the crisis between the Sudanese parties, preventing further suffering of the Sudanese people, and facilitating the arrival of relief and humanitarian aid to the affected areas, especially for the most vulnerable groups, including the sick, children, the elderly and women. The Ministry underscored its steadfast support for all endeavors working towards de-escalation, achieving a ceasefire, and initiating Political dialogue, that facilitates the restoration of peace, safety and security and fulfils the aspirations of the brotherly Sudanese people for stability and prosperity. Distributed by APO Group on behalf of United Arab Emirates Ministry of Foreign Affairs & International Cooperation.
